TopicTitle: Staging Issues After Undocking - Engine Duplicated

Articles.Content: I launched both parts of this vessel into LKO separately. First was the LH2-fueled SWERV-powered transfer stage, and then the methalox-fueled lander. Docked in LKO, transferred to Duna system and made orbit around Ike. Undocked and landed on Ike, then took off, rendezvoused and docked again, and after messing around in Duna space, headed back to Kerbin. I made orbit around Kerbin and separated the lander from the transfer stage. After undocking the staging was all confused and showing no available dV despite the propellant tanks having plenty. I fiddled around by creating and deleting some dummy stages, dragging the engine into one of them along the way. Somehow, the engine ended  up being duplicated in the staging list even though there's only one engine on the lander.
